Pig Game is a dice game with 2 players. Players roll one/two/three dice as many times as they wish or until they roll a 1(dead side, can be changed). Their score for the turn is the sum of their rolls unless they get a 1(dead side), then itâ€™s zero. Players keep taking turns rolling until someone gets to 100(win score can be changed). If the player who had the first roll reaches 100(win score), the second player may still take their turn (so that both players get the same number of turns). The player with the highest score wins.
